remarks: Two sets have the dominance relationship iff their cardinalities have the subset relationship.  Equation i of [Quine] p. 232.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement: carddom $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( ( card ` A ) C_ ( card ` B ) <-> A ~<_ B ) ) $.
